channel.title: BannedUsers file deleting itself?
channel.description: Why on Earth does my bannedusers.txt delete all the banned users in there regularly? Can anyone give an explanation and a possible solution please?

item.title: BannedUsers file deleting itself?
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

[quote=“0wned_pl0x, post:2, topic:196768”]Well um do you use the ::unban command that musicmad released?

I used it once and it deleted my whole bannedusers.txt as well (Because he coded it wrong)

If its just deleting by itself i have no clue what it is.[/quote]

Yes I do believe its because of that.

Does anybody have a functioning Unban command? I can't be arsed to add my own.

Read full topic

item.title: BannedUsers file deleting itself?
item.dc:creator: @Stanyer Stanyer
item.description:
@Stanyer wrote:

Because when you banned someone, it probably malfunctioned and deleted the whole file.

This sir, is why you use MySQL.

Read full topic
